arts.ttl: Allegri won’t be able to rely on Loftus-Cheek vs Fiorentina – Here’s who’ll replace him
arts.sum: Last night brought another bad news for Max Allegri: besides the unavailable Pulisic, Rabiot, Estupinan, and Jashari, the list risked growing. During yesterday’s training at Milanello, Loftus-Cheek felt a muscle strain. According to the latestupdates, the Englishman, formerly of Chelsea, Crystal Palace and Fulham, is unlikely to even sit on the bench due to this […]

arts.ttl: A six-year San Siro drought: All the key stats ahead of Milan vs. Fiorentina
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan welcome struggling Fiorentina to San Siro on Sunday night for a reunion with the old boss Stefano Pioli. For Milan the task is rather simple: win to go back top of the league after both Napoli and Roma lost 1-0 on Saturday. arts.ttl: Leao challenges kean for the goal in Milan – Fiorentina
arts.sum: Milan vs Fiorentina also means Rafael Leao against Moise Kean, two top players who share a common passion off the pitch: music. arts.sum: Until now, the AC Milan team of head coach Massimiliano Allegri has managed to cope without him, but given the injury crisis affecting the team, Rafael Leao now has the duty and responsibility to lead his teammates toward the top of the Serie A table.
